info.title: Educ-Map API Documentation
info.description: API for higher education institutions directory in Madagascar

example: The email has already been taken.

post.summary: Login to get an authentication token

get.summary: Get the currently authenticated user's profile

put.summary: Update the currently authenticated user's profile

example: The email has already been taken.

post.description: Logout a user by invalidating the token.

get.summary: Get a list of all categories
get.description: Display a listing of the categories with filtering options.

post.description: Store a newly created category in storage.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the category to retrieve

parameters.name: include_establishments
parameters.description: Include establishments count for this category

put.description: Update the specified category in storage.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the category to update

delete.description: Remove the specified category from storage.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the category to delete

get.summary: Get a paginated list of establishments with optional filtering and sorting
get.description: Display a listing of the establishments with filtering options.

parameters.name: reference_start_date
parameters.description: Filter by references with date after this value (YYYY-MM-DD)

parameters.name: reference_end_date
parameters.description: Filter by references with date before this value (YYYY-MM-DD)

parameters.name: sort_by
parameters.description: Field to sort by (name, student_count, reference_date)

post.description: Store a newly created establishment in storage.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the establishment to retrieve

put.description: Update the specified establishment in storage.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the establishment to update

delete.description: Remove the specified establishment from storage.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the establishment to delete

get.description: Get recently added establishments or those with recent accreditations.

get.summary: Get lightweight establishment data for map markers
get.description: Get lightweight establishment data for map markers.

get.summary: Compare multiple establishments side by side
get.description: Compare multiple establishments side by side.

parameters.name: ids[]
parameters.description: Array of establishment IDs to compare

get.summary: Get information about all available list endpoints
get.description: Get a summary of all available list endpoints.

get.summary: Get the authenticated user's saved searches
get.description: Retrieve saved searches for the authenticated user.

post.summary: Save a search query and filters for the authenticated user
post.description: Store a newly created search history in storage.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the saved search to delete

403.description: Unauthorized - not owner of this search

establishments_count.description: Number of establishments in this category (included when include_establishments=true)
